articles.title: Canadian CEOs less confident in global economy than peers amid trade concerns: survey

articles.title: What is medetomidine and why is it showing up in B.C.'s unregulated drug supply?
articles.description: Health officials say there's been an increase in medetomidine — a powerful sedative used by veterinarians — showing up in unregulated drugs. When mixed with opiates like fentanyl, it can be deadly.
